<!-- Custom CSS for font, typing animation, and styling -->
<style>
/* Apply Open Sans */
body, h1, p {
  font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
}

/* Typing Animation */
.typing-title {
  color: #2a9d8f;
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 3em;
  text-align: center;
  white-space: nowrap;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-right: 4px solid #2a9d8f; /* cursor effect */
  width: 0;
  animation: typing 3s steps(18, end) forwards, blink 0.75s step-end infinite;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

/* Animate the typing */
@keyframes typing {
  from { width: 0; }
  to { width: 18ch; } /* adjust to number of characters in your title */
}

/* Blinking cursor */
@keyframes blink {
  50% { border-color: transparent; }
}

/* Paragraph styling */
.intro-text {
  color: #264653;
  font-weight: 400;
  font-size: 18px;
  line-height: 1.5;
  max-width: 700px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  text-align: center;
}
</style>
